Main_Activity YOU KNOW WHEN ITS RIGHT --------------------------------------------------------
sign-in with phone number WOO THE DATING APP WOMEN LOVE PRIVATE + SECURE + MEANINGFUL We put women first. We NEVER post to Facebook ever. SIGN IN WITH FACEBOOK By tapping Sign in, you agree with our Privacy Terms. Enter Mobile No Your mobile number Proceed -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
My Name First Name (mandatory) Last Name (optional) NEXT To protect your privacy, we only show initials for Women and First Name for Men -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My Gender I am a Man I am a Woman BACK
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My Birthday DD MM YYYY Please enter your true date of birth hare. It will help us find you best matches fast.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Add your photos Please review our tips to make sure your pics are approved and get liked. Where do you want to add picture from? GALLERY FACEBOOK CAMERA ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Relationship and Lifestyle Share more about yourself to be discovered by the right people Relationship Relationship status (Select one) #Single + #Single and with kids + #Divorced + #Divorced and with Kids + #Widowed + #Widowed and with Kids + #Separated #Separated and with Kids +
What are you looking for on Woo (Select one) #Relationship + #Something casual + #Do not know yet + #Marriage +
Lifestyle Choices Smoking/Non Smoking (Select one) #Smoker + #Non-smoker + #Trying to quit
Drinking (Select one) #Drinks frequently + #Teetotaler #Social drinker +
Diet (Select one) #Vegetarian + #Vegan + #Non-vegetarian +
Workout (Select one) #Active + #Sometimes + #Almost never +
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Choose interests Add tags that describe you best to meet like-minded people. Add at least 3 tags
IPL + HipHop + Calligraphy + ScubaDriving + Democrat + NoExpenseTraveler + Football + Sculpting + Hermit + DogPerson + StayPositive + Lesbian + DanceMachine + Pottery + PoliticallyIncorrect + RapMusic + ClassicalMusic + Writing + Bowling + Witty + NatureWalks + Wanderlust + Electronic + LongWalks + ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- About Me Write about yourself... Upto 300 Keep it clean! No phone, messenger details, web links, abusive or explicit content please.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Me
View my profile Get member privileges Likes and Visits Crush Received Liked Profiles Skipped Profiles Woo Globe
WOO TIPS
All swipe and no talk makes dating dull. Go ahead and chat. Even better, call from Woo Phone to not share your number
More talking, No stalking. We show women name as initials and first name for men. Respect their privacy.
Zero Tolerance Woo is built for respect and consent. Report the ones who do not fit in.
Be Patient Miracles take time
TALK + TIME = TRUST Spend time talking and establish trust before you ask for or share personal information
Respect is a two way street Be the reason they smile, not the reason they log off the app.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My location
Woo Globe Meet people across location, communities and religion with Woo Globe
Their distance from me
Age range
Gender preferences
Notifications Match And Chat Crush received Sound alerts
